definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Some factories have closed, some owners are selling their machines.
sentences.chinese: 一些工廠已經倒閉，一些廠主們正在售賣設備。

sentences.english: Owing to the economic crisis, the factory owner is running his factory down.
sentences.chinese: 由於經濟危機，廠主在對工廠採取緊縮措施。

sentences.english: The owner did not utter a word, but handed him fifteen sous.
sentences.chinese: 廠主沒說一句話，給了他十五個蘇。

sentences.english: The Chinese owners ignore the unions or pretend to speak no English.
sentences.chinese: 這個中國廠主要麼無視工會，要麼裝作不會英語。

sentences.english: So that it was the house which demolished the coppersmith.
sentences.chinese: 因此，反而是屋子拆毀了廠主。
